ActSpecial Appointment Regulations, No. 2003-10
PrecisAppointment of PAUL-ANDRÉ MASSÉ of Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, to be Special Advisor to the Chairperson of the Canadian Forces Grievance Board, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending February 29, 2004, effective June 2. 2003.
